name: FPS UI
description:
This is a FPS DOOM like game..

BUT there is a twist: you are the guy who updates the HUD!

Use the buttons next to each info on the HUD to update the status according to the player's actions. 

REMEMBER: Health equals to 0 is Game Over!

Made in 5 hours for Trijam #154

Unfortunately it took longer than the stipulated time but it was my first experience with GameJams and I'm very happy with the result.

Assets used:

Enemies: by hiro (hamstone)

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/retro-act-rpg-sprite-pack-01...

Shoot Effect: by NYKNCK
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/free-pixel-art-fx-pa...

Pixel font: By Style-7

https://www.1001freefonts.com/advanced-pixel-7.font
